details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.21 Fonts - 7.21.3 Composite fonts - CIDToGIDMap
details.description: ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117 requires that all embedded Type 2 CIDFonts in the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117.

rule.description: ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117 requires that all embedded Type 2 CIDFonts in the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117.

error.message: A Type 2 CIDFont dictionary has missing or invalid CIDToGIDMap entry
